channel.title: Free Amazon next-day delivery loophole
channel.description:
[ol][li]Place your order with the free super saver delivery[/li] [li][url=https://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/css/order-history/ref=ya__43_e?ie=UTF8&orderFilter=open]View your most recent orders[/url][/li] [li]Press change delivery option[/li] [li]Update to expedited - Shipment cost is added to invoice but not charged as payment has already been taken[/li][/ol]
Don't know why this works, must just be a temporary loophole. Just got my [url=http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B0031M9K5U/ref=oh_details_o00_s01_i01]hand hoover[/url] :).

item.title: Free Amazon next-day delivery loophole
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

only issue I have with this is that they may charge you for the extra shipping in the future, and/or you’re taking money from small businesses if you’re using the market

Read full topic

item.title: Free Amazon next-day delivery loophole
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

last week, no only the amount for the hoover was taken, yet the bill states an extra cost for shipping which i did not have to pay

Read full topic

item.title: Free Amazon next-day delivery loophole
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I can’t imagine it being that easy. How long ago did you make the order? Sure they just wont debit from your acc next working day?

Read full topic

item.title: Free Amazon next-day delivery loophole
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[ol][li]Place your order with the free super saver delivery[/li]
[li]View your most recent orders[/li]
[li]Press change delivery option[/li]
[li]Update to expedited - Shipment cost is added to invoice but not charged as payment has already been taken[/li][/ol]

Don’t know why this works, must just be a temporary loophole. Just got my hand hoover :).

Read full topic
